channel.description: Recent content in linux on Ibrahim Ahmed

item.title: Developing with C/C++ on console
item.description: I am taking a High Performance Computing course this semester. For that we have to ssh into the university’s computing cluster. The interface is entirely console based. Now that might seem awesome at first: typing away commands like a “hacker”. And it is awesome. But after a while it gets tiring, particularly when I am writing code.
